snippet.title: Gordak aka Gord@k (1997) PC Win3.11 Longplay | Zen Master Ninja Levels of Emotion Damage
snippet.description:
A 3-D adventure game in which you are sent into cyberspace to stop Gord@k, an evil sentient computer virus. Exploring surreal VR landscapes, piecing together cluelessness , and finding items that can destroy your inner sanctum. In a game that has only one difficulty Asian . 

When items are pointless , hot spots in this Dome QuckTime 360VR game are so small ... you have to press SPACE to force some to work ... or even enlarge them by Shift or CTRL ... to be honest this old adventure only took me 5h to beat , battle tested mind ... but had no stable Electricity to edit it down ... yey 

Emotion Damage Provided by Steven He 
www.youtube.com/@StevenHe
youtube.com/watch?v=miD_TWmdGIY

PS. This game gave me NetZone vibes https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MvZt0DMdl6s ... but that game was 20x better then this ... and longer ... since if you knew what to do you could speed run Gord@k in 10 min ...

This Video is a part of my Cynical Games Review Site : https://gbacklog.blogspot.com/
You can also find me here : 
https://www.bitchute.com/channel/hfric/
https://twitter.com/HfricGB
frictionomatic@tutanota.com
